summary: Comprehensive E2E testing of RevStrux Revenue Reconciliation Engine completed successfully. All backend APIs (25/25) and frontend workflows tested thoroughly.
passed_tests: Synthetic data generation (all 6 CSV files loaded)
File validation with proper error/warning display
Identity review page with auto-matched (54), needs review (1), unmatched (3) counts
Analysis processing with all 5 steps completing successfully
Dashboard page displaying score (95), coverage metrics, and revenue at risk
Account lineage view with subscription breakdown
Export page with CSV and PDF download options
Template downloads for all 6 file types
Complete user workflow from upload to export
Navigation menu functionality across all pages
